r.d: Zip is an extension to create, modify and read zip files.
r.n: - Fixed bug #71923 (integer overflow in ZipArchive::getFrom*). (CVE-2016-3078) (Stas) - Fixed bug #72258 (ZipArchive converts filenames to unrecoverable form). (Anatol) - Fixed bug #72434 (ZipArchive class Use After Free Vulnerability in PHP's GC algorithm and unserialize). (Dmitry)
